message: Import statement for 'org.sputnikdev.bluetooth.manager.transport.CharacteristicAccessType.*' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.sputnikdev.bluetooth.manager.transport.CharacteristicAccessType.*.
'enableValueNotifications' has incorrect indentation level 4, expected level should be 8.
